mapper.insert: insert into user_property (user_id, property_nickname, property_signature, property_sex, property_email, property_location, property_birthday, property_gmt_create, property_gmt_modified) values (#{userId}, #{propertyNickname}, #{propertySignature}, #{propertySex}, #{propertyEmail}, #{propertyLocation}, #{propertyBirthday}, #{propertyGmtCreate}, #{propertyGmtModified})
mapper.update: select property_nickname, property_signature, property_sex, property_email, property_location, property_birthday, property_gmt_create, property_gmt_modified from user_property where user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: select property_nickname, property_signature, property_sex, property_email, property_location, property_birthday, property_gmt_create, property_gmt_modified from user_property where user_id = #{userId}
